  32. ‌type field_usage_warning =
  33.   | Unused
  34.   | Not_read
  35.   | Not_mutated

  37. ‌type constructor_usage_warning =
  38.   | Unused
  39.   | Not_constructed
  40.   | Only_exported_private

  116. ‌type alert = {kind:string; message:string; def:loc; use:loc}

  118. ‌val parse_options : bool -> string -> alert option

  120. ‌val parse_alert_option: string -> unit
  121.   (** Disable/enable alerts based on the parameter to the -alert
  122.       command-line option.  Raises [Arg.Bad] if the string is not a
  123.       valid specification.
  124.   *)

  126. ‌val without_warnings : (unit -> 'a) -> 'a
  127.   (** Run the thunk with all warnings and alerts disabled. *)

  129. ‌val is_active : t -> bool
  130. ‌val is_error : t -> bool

  135. ‌type reporting_information =
  136.   { id : string
  137.   ; message : string
  138.   ; is_error : bool
  139.   ; sub_locs : (loc * string) list;
  140.   }

  142. ‌val report : t -> [ `Active of reporting_information | `Inactive ]
  143. ‌val report_alert : alert -> [ `Active of reporting_information | `Inactive ]

  156. ‌val mk_lazy: (unit -> 'a) -> 'a Lazy.t
  157.     (** Like [Lazy.of_fun], but the function is applied with
  158.         the warning/alert settings at the time [mk_lazy] is called. *)
